## MAXIMUM\_BORROWING\_RATE variable

Value that the [borrowing rate](./arth-lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) will never exceed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MAXIMUM_BORROWING_RATE: Decimal
```
